venue.address_2: cross street is Washington Street in Dudley Station
venue.name: Haley House Cafe

item.description:
The Color of Film Collaborative in partnership with the Haley House periodically present documentaries and narrative films via Dinner and a Movie. The Spring offering is scheduled for Friday May 13, 2011.

Dinner will be served at 6 PM, it features Take Back the Kitchen's signature Turkey Burgers topped with Onions & Mushrooms and Gruyere Cheese on a Whole Wheat Bun with a side of oven-baked Sweet Potato Fries. (Vegan Burgers are available as a substitute for Turkey Burgers.) Dessert will feature Haley House Apple Crumb Pie topped with Toscanini's Ice Cream

The film, Waiting for Superman, screens at 7 PM with discussion afterward. This documentary analyzes the American public school system by following several students through the educational system, as they hope to be selected in a lottery for acceptance into charter schools. The film received the Audience Award for best documentary at the Sundance Film Festival as well as being named Best Documentary Film at the Critics’ Choice Movie Award

Purchase tickets for $21.69 at http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/173408.

Public Transit:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. 
Orange Line subway to Ruggles Station then any bus to Dudley Station

Driving Directions:

Check out Google to arrange your driving directions

Parking:

Parking lot on Dade Street as well as along Washington Street.

Since everyone must make their own arrangements, the no show policy doesn't apply. 

 

Would also like you to know the Roxbury International Film Festival (RIFF) showcases and honors the work of emerging and established filmmakers of color. It has become the largest festival in New England dedicated to celebrating this genre. This is always a great time with fascinating people. Run time is Thursday July 28th to Sunday July 31st.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and A Movie on Friday May 13th
